column4: I have been looking for a 3d ping pong game that i can download...anybody can help me out
try http://cannonsmash.sourceforge.net/ .. it was a simple google search
google up "3d ping pong linux" for more
what looks complicated?  installing cannonsmash from source?  it's not really so hard.
well my suggestion is to google around some then.  there were lots of other hits to investigate.
I have been... oh well back to google again
playing what?  no, I am trying to get some kind of basic linux on a 32mb laptop
but for me that counts as playing ;)
hopin' so...  but so far no love from the ubuntu or mepis install cds... neither makes it too far before choking
